WRITING.TEXT: I'll have to stop in and find out! I have been able to convince the Kroger by me to do this but its not organic produce. Thanks for the tip.

I have seen this before many times and try to do the same thing. The one by me has 3 dumpsters, 2 for books (recycling) and 1 for everything else (dvds, records, trash). I always take as much as I can
I''d love to know where you found that dog food! Petcompany? lol
Exactly what I had to do. My wife was thrilled when I handed her 4 new hair tools. They tried to cut them close to the formed insert to the tool but its easy enough to fix.

Uploaded my vlog last night at 10pm (EST) and its still processing. I live in Indianapolis. I've heard of regions having issues where the servers are located... I hope they fix it soon because this happened last week as well.
Totally agree, Aldi is a regular stop for me. You'll find things like air mattresses, pots/pans, vacuums and other merchandise thats been returned as well!
I used to have a Marsh by my house and would score big hauls like that weekly! It was insane the amount of stuff they threw away... Awesome find!
Totally agree, post it up on ebay and make some extra money! Incredible dive!

All I can say is keep looking and expand your search! It took me a good solid 2 months of going place to place and logging what I found/did not find before understanding whats worth my time. Stick with it!
Nice find!!!! Still trying to score at my local CVS.
